thread.title: Disney Doodle: Rapunzel Takes Over Kidcot Stations at Epcot
thread.title_full: Disney Doodle: Rapunzel Takes Over Kidcot Stations at Epcot

author: Jennifer Fickley-Baker
title: Disney Doodle: Rapunzel Takes Over Kidcot Stations at Epcot
text:
Our Disney Doodle art series answers the question: What would a Disney character do if her or she would be able to enjoy a Disney Park all on their own?
The first Disney Doodle we have to share with you this year stars my favorite Disney princess , Rapunzel from the 2010 movie, “ Tangled .” With Rapunzel’s artistic talents, it’s likely she’d head straight to one of the Kidcot stations at Epcot where she could draw and color.
“The Kidcot station in the Germany Pavilion is so adorable!,” said artist Ashley Taylor. “If anyone is going to spend time coloring, it’s Rapunzel!”
